Who are your influences in your music?
Whom do you get your influences from?
Well, I get my influences from lots of different places.
I co-produce everything that I write,...
...so usually me and whoever I'm working with, it's a very organic experience.
Sometimes, I'll say, "Oh, I have this idea for a record..."
"...called 'Beautiful, Dirty, Rich', and I'm feeling kind of like Prince vibe."
